Package org.assertj.swing.applet

Provides support for testing Applets.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
StatusDisplay Displays the state of an Applet.
 

Class Summary
AppletViewer A window that displays an Applet.
BasicAppletContext Basic (and limited) implementation of AppletContext.
BasicAppletStub Basic (and limited) implementation of AppletStub.
 

Package org.assertj.swing.applet Description

Provides support for testing Applets.
